Documentation.long_help: Read data files that are compressed using the SZ3 compressor.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The name of the file to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: DomainDimensions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the dimensions of the domain (X, Y, Z).

EnumerationProperty.name: DataType
EnumerationProperty.Documentation: Select the data type for decompression: single-precision (float) or double-precision (double).
